alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Randolph; Sharp (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 4:20PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Randolph, western Lawrence and east central Sharp Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 420 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over Lake Charles State Park, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pocahontas... Black Rock... Lake Charles State Park... Imboden... Ravenden... Portia... Lynn... Ravenden Springs... Annieville... Smithville... Powhatan... Shannon... Birdell... Elnora... Eaton... Lauratown... Clover Bend... Coffman... Sharum... Manson... LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
